episodeTitle: The King of the Fish-Man Island! Neptune, the God of the Sea!
episodeTitleJapanese: 魚人島の王 海神ネプチューン！
description: The Straw Hats receive an invitation to Ryugu Palace from King Neptune, while Hody Jones demonstrates his terrifying power by destroying Gyro's ship and reveals his plan to kill Neptune and establish fish-men supremacy.

events.title: Gyro's First Appearance
events.description: Gyro, captain of the Gyro Pirates, attempts to escape from Hody Jones after refusing to join the New Fish-Man Pirates as enslaved subordinates. He is pursued by Hody who seeks to make an example of him.
events.significance: Introduces Gyro as a victim of Hody's brutality and sets up the demonstration of Hody's power and the threat he poses.

events.title: Hody Jones Destroys Gyro's Ship
events.description: Hody Jones uses his enhanced strength from Energy Steroids to completely destroy Gyro's ship using only his jaws while his hands are chained. He deliberately leaves survivors to spread word of his terrifying power.
events.significance: Demonstrates Hody's overwhelming power and ruthless nature, establishing him as a major threat. Shows the devastating effects of Energy Steroids.

quotes.text: Let them escape. They'll spread the word of my power.
quotes.speaker: Hody Jones
quotes.context: After destroying Gyro's ship, deliberately letting survivors flee

events.title: Energy Steroid Mechanics Explained
events.description: Zeo, one of Hody's officers, explains that fish-men are naturally born with ten times the strength of humans. He reveals that Energy Steroids double a fish-man's power for each pill consumed, making them exponentially stronger.
events.significance: Establishes crucial information about the Energy Steroids that will be central to the arc's conflict. Explains the source of Hody's immense power and the danger he poses.

quotes.text: Fish-men are born with ten times the strength of humans. And Energy Steroids double our power with each pill we take.
quotes.speaker: Zeo
quotes.context: Explaining the mechanics of Energy Steroids to his crew

events.title: Zeo's First Appearance
events.description: Zeo, a Japanese wobbegong fish-man and one of Hody Jones's officers in the New Fish-Man Pirates, appears and explains the mechanics of Energy Steroids.
events.significance: Introduces one of Hody's key subordinates who will play a role in the upcoming conflict.

events.title: New Fish-Man Pirates Officers Debut
events.description: Dosun (a hammerhead shark fish-man), Daruma (a cookie-cutter shark fish-man), and Ikaros Much (a giant squid fish-man) make their first appearances as officers of the New Fish-Man Pirates alongside Hody Jones.
events.significance: Introduces the main antagonist group's leadership structure and establishes the threat level facing Fish-Man Island.

events.title: King Neptune's Grand Entrance
events.description: King Neptune, the coelacanth merman ruler of the Ryugu Kingdom and Fish-Man Island, makes his first appearance riding Megalo, a large shark. He appears before the Straw Hat Pirates in a grand and theatrical manner.
events.significance: Introduces the legitimate ruler of Fish-Man Island and establishes him as an important ally. His appearance contrasts with Hody's villainous introduction, setting up the conflict between the two.

quotes.text: I am Neptune, King of the Ryugu Kingdom! I welcome you to Fish-Man Island!
quotes.speaker: Neptune
quotes.context: Neptune's theatrical introduction to the Straw Hats

events.title: Invitation to Ryugu Palace
events.description: King Neptune formally invites the Straw Hat Pirates to a banquet at Ryugu Palace, the royal palace of the Ryugu Kingdom. Pappag explains details about the magnificent palace to the crew.
events.significance: Sets up the Straw Hats' visit to Ryugu Palace, which will be crucial to the arc's plot. Shows Neptune's gratitude and hospitality.

quotes.text: I would be honored if you would join me for a banquet at Ryugu Palace!
quotes.speaker: Neptune
quotes.context: Inviting the Straw Hats to the palace

events.title: Hody's Motivation: Fisher Tiger and Arlong's Legacy
events.description: Hody Jones reveals his motivation, declaring that both Fisher Tiger and Arlong's wills to fight against humans were destroyed by humans. He positions himself as the one who will succeed where they failed.
events.significance: Connects Hody to the legacy of Fisher Tiger and Arlong, establishing his ideology and motivation. References important past events and characters, particularly Fisher Tiger's story.

quotes.text: Fisher Tiger and Arlong... both of their wills were destroyed by humans. But I will succeed where they failed!
quotes.speaker: Hody Jones
quotes.context: Explaining his motivation to his crew

events.title: Hody Vows to Kill Neptune
events.description: Hody Jones makes a declaration to his crew that he will kill King Neptune and establish fish-men as the superior race. He orders his crew to ascend to Fish-Man Island to begin their plan.
events.significance: Establishes the main conflict of the Fish-Man Island Arc. Hody's plan to assassinate Neptune and take over the kingdom creates the central tension that the Straw Hats will have to resolve.

quotes.text: I will kill Neptune and prove that fish-men are the superior race! All forces, advance to Fish-Man Island!
quotes.speaker: Hody Jones
quotes.context: Declaring his plan to his crew

events.title: The Coming Storm for Fish-Man Island
events.description: The episode builds tension by juxtaposing Neptune's peaceful invitation to the Straw Hats with Hody's violent plans, creating a sense of impending conflict and danger for Fish-Man Island.
events.significance: Establishes the dramatic irony that while Neptune welcomes the Straw Hats peacefully, a major threat is approaching that will endanger the entire kingdom. Foreshadows the coming battle.

quotes.text: Fish-men are born with ten times the strength of humans. And Energy Steroids double our power with each pill we take.
quotes.speaker: Zeo

quotes.text: I am Neptune, King of the Ryugu Kingdom! I welcome you to Fish-Man Island!
quotes.speaker: Neptune
quotes.context: Neptune's grand introduction to the Straw Hats

quotes.text: I will kill Neptune and prove that fish-men are the superior race! All forces, advance to Fish-Man Island!
quotes.speaker: Hody Jones
quotes.context: Declaring his plan to overthrow Neptune

themes.description: The episode explores the cycle of hatred between humans and fish-men through Hody's twisted interpretation of Fisher Tiger and Arlong's legacies. Hody's plan to establish fish-men supremacy mirrors real-world racism.
themes.symbolism: Hody represents how hatred and prejudice can corrupt even noble causes, as he perverts Fisher Tiger's dream of equality into one of supremacy.
culturalReferences: Historical parallels to racial supremacy movements

themes.description: The Energy Steroids represent artificial power that corrupts. Hody's reliance on them shows how the pursuit of power through shortcuts can lead to moral degradation.
themes.symbolism: Energy Steroids symbolize the dangerous allure of easy power and the consequences of taking shortcuts.

themes.description: Hody positions himself as the successor to Fisher Tiger and Arlong, but his methods and ideology are twisted versions of their dreams, exploring how legacies can be corrupted.
themes.symbolism: The contrast between Neptune's legitimate, peaceful rule and Hody's violent uprising represents different visions for Fish-Man Island's future.

characterSpotlights.development: Hody is established as a ruthless, power-hungry villain who uses Energy Steroids to enhance his strength. His hatred of humans and plan to kill Neptune sets up the arc's main conflict.
keyActions: Reveals his plan to kill Neptune
Orders his crew to advance on Fish-Man Island
quotes: I will kill Neptune and prove that fish-men are the superior race!
Let them escape. They'll spread the word of my power.

characterSpotlights.development: Neptune is introduced as a kind, theatrical, and hospitable king who welcomes the Straw Hats to his kingdom. His peaceful nature contrasts sharply with Hody's violence.
keyActions: Welcomes the Straw Hats to Fish-Man Island
Invites them to a banquet at Ryugu Palace
quotes: I am Neptune, King of the Ryugu Kingdom! I welcome you to Fish-Man Island!
I would be honored if you would join me for a banquet at Ryugu Palace!

characterSpotlights.development: Zeo is introduced as one of Hody's loyal officers who provides exposition about fish-men strength and Energy Steroids.
quotes: Fish-men are born with ten times the strength of humans. And Energy Steroids double our power with each pill we take.

mangaDifferences.difference: The anime includes extended scenes of Pappag explaining Ryugu Palace to the Straw Hats, which were not present in the manga.
The anime extends the scene of Hody destroying Gyro's ship with additional action sequences and dramatic effects.

trivia.fact: Episode 530 adapts Chapter 611 of the manga, covering pages 2-17.
This episode marks the first appearance of King Neptune, who is voiced by Minoru Inaba in Japanese and Bruce DuBose in English.
The episode aired on January 8, 2012 in Japan, with the simulcast version airing January 7, 2012 due to time zone differences.
Energy Steroids are introduced in this episode as pills that double a fish-man's power with each dose, but they come with severe side effects that are revealed later in the arc.
During this period (episodes 517-590), One Piece did not have ending themes. Only the opening 'We Go!' by Hiroshi Kitadani was used.
